allow: Bash(# Try SOOP''s Algolia search \(if available\) curl -s ''https://live.sooplive.co.kr/api/main.php?szWork=GetMainBroadList'' \\ -H ''User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 \(Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64\) AppleWebKit/537.36'' \\ -H ''Referer: https://www.sooplive.co.kr/'' \\)
Bash(# ViewerShip에서 현재 방송중인 BJ 조회 curl -s ''https://viewership.softc.one/ranking/live'' \\ -H ''User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 \(Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64\) AppleWebKit/537.36'' \\)
Bash(# Try SOOP''s live broadcast API curl -s ""https://live.sooplive.co.kr/api/main_banner.php"" -H ""User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0"")

Bash(# Try to get live BJs from SOOP API curl -s ""https://live.sooplive.co.kr/api/broad_recommend.php"" \\ -H ""User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0"" \\ -H ""Referer: https://www.sooplive.co.kr/"" \\ | jq -r ''.recommend_live[]?.user_id // empty'')
Bash(# Try another SOOP API endpoint curl -s ""https://live.sooplive.co.kr/api/get_live_list.php?nPerPage=10"" \\ -H ""User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0"" \\ -H ""Referer: https://www.sooplive.co.kr/"")
Bash(# Try to get some BJ IDs from SOOP category pages curl -s ""https://play.sooplive.co.kr/handongsuk"" \\ -H ""User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0"" \\ -H ""Accept: text/html"")
Bash(then echo "✅ LIVE: $bjid" live_found="$bjid" fi done if [ -z "$live_found" ])
Bash(then echo "❌ No live BJs found in checked list" fi)
